title: Recursive Function Tracing
content: Consider the following recursive method defined in a Java class. What value is returned by the call `mystery(10)`?
explanation:
We trace the recursive calls:

mystery(10): (Even) returns mystery(5) + 1
mystery(5): (Odd) returns mystery(3) + 2
mystery(3): (Odd) returns mystery(2) + 2
mystery(2): (Even) returns mystery(1) + 1
mystery(1): (Base Case) returns 1

Substitution Back:
mystery(2) = 1 + 1 = 2
mystery(3) = 2 + 2 = 4
mystery(5) = 4 + 2 = 6
mystery(10) = 6 + 1 = 7
